ygData.subject: Re: Armor and Dual wield
ygData.msgSnippet: you should always have different weapons on dual weild such as a mino battle axe and a combine longsowrd, or a combine and a whip. ... === Kitono Silvermoon
ygData.messageBody:
you should always have different weapons on dual weild
such as a mino battle axe and a combine longsowrd, or
a combine and a whip.

--- John Cynkar <ref145@...> wrote:
> First of all, to answer the question of a full suit
> of bronze. A small suit can cost from 300p to 350p.
> Also, I bought a Symbol of loyalty to Vox Bracer
> for 20p! I found out that is twice as good as a
> Steel Plate one. Nonetheless, I am selling it
> because in a while it will probally be common.
> People have offered 400p and more for it! Talk
> about profit. I have just gotten dual wield, what
> should I use, I am thinking of buying two combine
> LS's, to replace my Dwarven 2H axe. Should I?
> Also, could two Tentacle whips be better than two
> combine LS's? Well, Can anyone tell me what 1H
> slashing weapons I should get, I have about 400p
> now. )
>
> Dubas,
> Mithaniel Marr.
>

===
Kitono Silvermoon *Shadow of the Night*

*We Were All Born To Die...*
